title: Verstappen and Wolff's 'holiday date' – will F1 champ move to Mercedes?
summary: Keen-eyed observers have spied Max Verstappen and Toto Wolff's heading to Sardinia at the same time – it's the latest development in the 'Verstappen to Mercedes' rumours

qa_pairs.question: Which team does Max Verstappen currently race for in Formula 1?
Who is the team principal of Mercedes-AMG Petronas Formula One Team?
What country is known for hosting the Formula 1 race known as the Sardinia Grand Prix?
